name: chieac-cms-backend-functions
description: Firebase Functions for ChiEAC CMS backend - handles Medium RSS ingestion, form submission notifications, and other backend services

scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.shell: NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation" firebase functions:shell
